availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Caroline Darnall Smith in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on June 19, 1841. Father of Theresa Smith, David Smith, and Octavia Smith. Married to Rhoda J. Glass Taylor Smith in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on January 19, 1850. Father of Milton Smith, Belle Smith, Georgia Ann Smith, Henry Smith, James Smith, and Rhoda Jane Smith. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Employed George W. Taylor as a farm laborer in Caldwell County in 1860.
